name: Strawberry Dessert - Aunt Sis
author: Becky Collier

ingredients.name: small package strawberry banana/strawberry jello - sugarfree

instructions: Slice istrawberries and mix with mashed bananas. Prepare Jello as directed on package - pour over strawberry / banana mixture - place in refugerator until gelled. Layer in cake pan - the jello with cool-whip antil oul is gone
